title: [Ta'Illistim, Shorchar Wey]
description: The wey passes behind the towering edifice of the Hall of Justice, its massive wall an unbroken plane of blue-grey granite.  Almost invisible against the night sky, some dark pennants flutter from the crenelated rooftop.  As if defying the dour atmosphere, some yellow daffodils perfume the night air with a gentle, pleasant scent.

The wey passes behind the towering edifice of the Hall of Justice, its massive wall an unbroken plane of blue-grey granite.  High overhead, sapphire and silver pennants flutter from the crenelated rooftop.  As if defying the dour atmosphere, a cheerful patch of bright yellow daffodils grows in the shelter of the wall.

The wey passes behind the towering edifice of the Hall of Justice, its massive wall an unbroken plane of silvery blue granite.  Almost invisible against the night sky, some dark pennants flutter from the crenelated rooftop.

The wey passes behind the towering edifice of the Hall of Justice, its massive wall an unbroken plane of silvery blue granite.  High overhead, sapphire and silver pennants flutter from the crenelated rooftop.
